Name: {name}
Address: {propertyAddress/AdTextArea_out}
The date the changes should be started: {startDate}
The date the community alarm system must be reconnected by: {alarmConDate}

Please note that from this date this property should be classed as Sheltered Accommodation

Additional comments: {#additionalComments}
Is this a standalone system: {standaloneSystem}
Sheltcat type (1, 2, 2.5)? {sheltcatType12}

Action to take

SAC Please enable the alarm system if it is NOT a standalone system.

Telecare Please update Jontek to make the record ACTIVE. If no details from the Scheme Manager, request the relevant information.

Debit Control In Northgate, please insert elements SPCHARGE and SERVCHARGE. If currently no SHELTCAT, change to SHELTCAT 0.5. If current SHELTCAT 0, change to SHELTCAT 1 via Bulk Elem from the able date using the correct codes fro the property type.

NTOs If Scheme Manager is not already aware, please notify them.
